title: Enhancing Predictive Learning Competencies: Qualitative Analysis Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental comprehension of organizational learning and predictive analytics, general awareness of social system change trends
context.additional_context: Participants Role-Play as Social Policy Planners or Project Managers in Public/Nonprofit Organizations, Experiencing Scenario-Based Predictive Activities in VR

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain the four core competencies (scenario development, stakeholder collaboration, strategic integration, continuous monitoring) of predictive activities within organizations
Learners can evaluate organizational learning effectiveness by analyzing responsibility structures and incentive systems for short-term/long-term predictive modes in VR simulations
Learners can propose governance structure improvements for predictive activities through team-based formative assessments and validate feasibility
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
